Controls:

Right-Mouse -Button:: Attack

Camera: W,A,S,D / Arrow keys

The goal:

Prove yourself to be the best pirate by defeating "Dark-Beard" and his ship!

Hint: you need to find him first.

Shop Island: "Tortuga"
